unnormalised: **Follower Analytics: Are You REALLY Seeing the Light?**
normalised: **follower analytics: are you really seeing the light?**

unnormalised: Okay, influencer marketing folks! Are you *actually* digging deep into your follower analytics, or just judging by the likes? Turns out, those surface-level numbers ain't telling the whole story.
normalised: okay, influencer marketing folks! are you *actually* digging deep into your follower analytics, or just judging by the likes? turns out, those surface-level numbers ain't telling the whole story.

unnormalised: Remember Meena from Mumbai, who thought she had a rock-solid 100K following for her sarees? A quick follower analysis revealed a good chunk were bots from, well, who knows where! Suddenly, that lucrative collaboration with 'Silk Route Emporium' on 26/01/2024 didn't seem so rosy.
normalised: remember meena from mumbai, who thought she had a rock-solid one hundred thousand following for her sarees? a quick follower analysis revealed a good chunk were bots from, well, who knows where! suddenly, that lucrative collaboration with 'silk route emporium' on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four didn't seem so rosy.

unnormalised: Institutions like IIM-Ahmedabad are even offering short courses now to demystify the data. They teach you how to spot those fake accounts and understand engagement patterns. It's more than just seeing *how many* followers; it's about *who* they are, where they're from (Delhi, Bengaluru, maybe even a few NRIs!), and what time (like 14:30 hrs IST!) they’re most active.
normalised: institutions like I I M-ahmedabad are even offering short courses now to demystify the data. they teach you how to spot those fake accounts and understand engagement patterns. it's more than just seeing *how many* followers; it's about *who* they are, where they're from (delhi, bengaluru, maybe even a few N R I s!), and what time (like fourteen thirty hours I S T!) they’re most active.

unnormalised: So, before you sign that deal or launch that campaign targeted for Diwali on 01/11/2024, invest in some proper analytics. Your wallet will thank you. Trust me, *yeh sab moh maya hai*, unless you have the data to back it up! Don’t be like Raju, who learned this lesson the hard way last year at 10:00 hrs.
normalised: so, before you sign that deal or launch that campaign targeted for diwali on first november two thousand and twenty four, invest in some proper analytics. your wallet will thank you. trust me, *yeh sab moh maya hai*, unless you have the data to back it up! don’t be like raju, who learned this lesson the hard way last year at ten hundred hours.
